alert.note: Alert for Northern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 9:31AM EST until January 06 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with the highest amounts near the Pennsylvania border. * WHERE...Northern Baltimore County. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as snow between 10 AM and 1 PM. The snow will mix with and then change to rain between 1 PM and 4 PM, then end during the mid evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
